summary: Serena Williams beat Sara Errani 4-6 7-6 -LRB- 3 -RRB- 6-3 in the Fed Cup play-off . The US were beaten 3-2 as Williams and Alison Riske were thrashed in the doubles rubber . The doubles defeat saw the US relegated to World Group II .
